summary: This document is an internal email correspondence discussing an open delivery related to Epstein. It involves multiple individuals from Deutsche Bank and highlights the need for action regarding the delivery. The email emphasizes confidentiality and the handling of privileged information.

persons.name: Vahe Stepanian

keyFacts: The email discusses an open delivery related to Epstein.
Vahe Stepanian is seeking clarification on whether any action is needed regarding the delivery.
The email emphasizes confidentiality and the handling of privileged information.

The document is classified for internal use only.
